summary:
First of all, sorry for my poor english.

This mod only changes the clothes of Muiri, the breton girl of The Hag's Cure in Markarth.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Courier New][center][/center][/font][font=Courier New][center][/center][/font]First of all, sorry for my poor english.
This mod only changes the clothes of Muiri, the breton girl of The Hag's Cure in Markarth.
Hello guys, this is my first mod, and yes, it's very very simpleÂ². The only thing that you have to do is put the file on the data folder on your directory or use the NMM.
It's only recommended if she is your spouse.
author: dhrakos
